info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 7:02PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Moderate to Heavy snowfall will impact portions of south central Grant, west central Luna and central Hidalgo Counties through 800 PM MST... At 659 PM MST, NWS Meteorologists were tracking a band of moderate to heavy snowfall impacting Interstate 10 from Lordsburg to Deming. HAZARD...Moderate to heavy snowfall and winds in excess of 45 mph reducing visibility to 0.5 to 2 SM. SOURCE...Satellite, surface observations, and web cameras. IMPACT...Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility overnight. Locations impacted include... Deming, Gage, and Separ. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 30 and 88. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
